SVGTransformList.summary: The SVGTransformList interface defines a list of objects.

remarks.para: An SVGTransformList object can be designated as read only, which means that attempts to modify the object will result in an exception being thrown.
An SVGTransformList is indexable and can be accessed like an array.

SVGTransformListAppendItem.summary: The appendItem() method of the interface inserts a new item at the end of the list.

remarks.para: The inserted item is the item itself and not a copy.

SVGTransformListAppendItem.returns: An object; the appended item from the list.

SVGTransformListClear.summary: The clear() method of the interface clears all existing current items from the list, with the result being an empty list.

SVGTransformListConsolidate.summary: The consolidate() method of the interface consolidates the list of separate objects by multiplying the equivalent transformation matrices together to result in a list consisting of a single SVGTransform object of type SVG_TRANSFORM_MATRIX.

remarks.para: The consolidation operation creates a new SVGTransform object as the first and only item in the list.
The returned item is the item itself and not a copy. Any changes made to the item are immediately reflected in the list.

SVGTransformListConsolidate.returns: A live object; the consolidated transformation.

SVGTransformListCreateSVGTransformFromMa.summary: The createSVGTransformFromMatrix() method of the interface creates an object which is initialized to a transform of type SVG_TRANSFORM_MATRIX and whose values are the given matrix.

remarks.para: The values from the parameter matrix are copied; the matrix parameter is not adopted as SVGTransform::matrix.

SVGTransformListGetItem.summary: The getItem() method of the interface returns the specified item from the list.

remarks.para: The returned item is the item itself and not a copy. Any changes made to the item are immediately reflected in the list.
The first item is indexed at 0.

SVGTransformListGetItem.returns: An object; the specified item from the list.

SVGTransformListInitialize.summary: The initialize() method of the interface clears all existing current items from the list and re-initializes the list to hold the single item specified by the parameter.

remarks.para: If the inserted item is already in a list, it is removed from its previous list before it is inserted into this list. The inserted item is the item itself and not a copy.

SVGTransformListInitialize.returns: An object; the item inserted into the list.

SVGTransformListInsertItemBefore.summary: The insertItemBefore() method of the interface inserts a new item into the list at the specified position.

remarks.para: The first item is indexed at 0. The inserted item is the item itself and not a copy.

SVGTransformListInsertItemBefore.returns: An object; the inserted item from the list.

SVGTransformListLength.summary: The length read-only property of the interface represents the number of items in the list.
SVGTransformListLength.value: An integer; the number of objects in the list as an unsigned long.

SVGTransformListNumberOfItems.summary: The numberOfItems read-only property of the interface represents the number of items in the list.
SVGTransformListNumberOfItems.value: An integer; the number of objects in the list as an unsigned long.

SVGTransformListRemoveItem.summary: The removeItem() method of the interface removes an existing item from the list.
SVGTransformListRemoveItem.returns: An object; the removed item from the list.

SVGTransformListReplaceItem.summary: The replaceItem() method of the interface replaces an existing item in the list with a new item.

remarks.para: The inserted item is the item itself and not a copy.

SVGTransformListReplaceItem.returns: An object; the inserted item from the list.
